name: Color Drop Buckle
description:
Color Drop is a simple one touch game where all you have to do is to tap left or right to move the bucket at the bottom to collect the raining drop into the right bucket.Sounds easy- Have a shot and find out. Score as much as you can before you hit the wrong color. Try to beat your own score or challenge your friends.

Just press the relevant bucket or nearest arrow to move it to the center of the screen according to the color of falling ball.

Tap the left or right side of the screen to spin your color wheel. Match the falling circles with the correct color on your wheel as many times as you can as the game play gets faster and more challenging with each point you earn.

- Fast & infinite play/replay game play
- An addictive, fast paced, and never ending score-chaser challenge
- Minimalist Graphics
- Easy to learn One Touch Controls
- Game Center Achievements Supported.
- Game Center Leader board Supported.
- Optimized for a wide variety of iphones and ipad.
- Contain Red, Green, Blue buckets and balls.
- It helps to you to distinguish between different colors.
- Based on visual perception and intuitive perception of colors.
- Develop motor skills.

Color Drop is designed to be played by kids and adults of any gender.You can challenge yourself or your friend next to you.The game has good graphics, smooth animations and lovely colors.Color Drop Buckle is the best game for killing the free time.It improves your reflexes, increases your ability to make the right choice at the right moment. The game is simple and fun, you should click the choose color, but you should do it quickly because time moves on.

The challenge never ends. Rotate the buckles by tapping on the left or right side of the screen to rotate counter clockwise and anti clockwise, respectively. Drop as many as possible and boast your score to your friends!
